MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G69 postcode area of Baillieston. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:12pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Baillieston Cross substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:53pm on Monday, 12 April 2021
